March 1, 1981 D Oldham Contest (Section A)
Oldham Contest (Section A) 10 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Oldham Contest oldham-contest-section-a
None
Queen Elizabeth Hall, Oldham, Greater Manchester, England, UK Prizes - 1st £120 and cup, 2nd £90, 3rd £70. 9 bands competed. 10th annual contest.
June 4, 2014, 12:58 p.m. Jan. 27, 2015, 1:45 p.m.
